User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user account within the DebtFlow application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user account.

firstName.description: The first name of the user.

lastName.description: The last name of the user.

email.description: The email address of the user.

signUpDate.description: The date and time the user signed up.

role.description: The role of the user, determining their permissions.

Customer.title: Customer
Customer.description: Represents a customer with a unique code.

invoiceDate.description: The date the invoice was issued.

invoiceAmount.description: The total amount of the invoice.

outstandingAmount.description: The remaining outstanding amount of the invoice.

region.description: The geographical region associated with the invoice.

FinancialRecord.title: FinancialRecord
FinancialRecord.description: A monthly record containing a set of invoices for a specific customer.

customerCode.description: The code of the customer this record belongs to.

year.description: The financial year of the record.

month.description: The month of the record (e.g., 1 for January).

invoices.description: A list of invoices for this period.

definition.description: Stores individual user data, keyed by the Firebase Authentication UID.

params.name: userId
params.description: The Firebase Authentication UID of the user.

definition.description: Stores information about each unique customer.

params.name: customerId
params.description: The document ID for the customer.

definition.description: Stores monthly financial records, which contain invoices for customers.

params.name: recordId
params.description: The document ID for the financial record.
